metadata.title: Adobe Flash Player before 13.0.0.244 and 14.x and 15.x before 15.0.0.152 on Windows, Adobe AIR before 15.0.0.249 on Windows allow remote attackers to bypass the Same Origin Policy (CVE-2014-0548)
metadata.description: Adobe Flash Player before 13.0.0.244 and 14.x and 15.x before 15.0.0.152 on Windows and OS X and before 11.2.202.406 on Linux, Adobe AIR before 15.0.0.249 on Windows and OS X and before 15.0.0.252 on Android, Adobe AIR SDK before 15.0.0.249, and Adobe AIR SDK & Compiler before 15.0.0.249 allow remote attackers to bypass the Same Origin Policy via unspecified vectors.
